testimonials.title: testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Known and loved by the GOATs

data.name: Phantom
data.content:
Few.

Shout-out to @SuperteamEarn and @SuperteamDAO for onboarding devs around the world into the ecosystem! 🤝 https://t.co/78iAaIeXld

data.name: Austin Federa | 🛡️
data.content: Superteam Earn is quietly becoming a powerful force for growth in the ecosystem 🔥 https://t.co/vKmNhkMdYi

data.name: Kanav Kariya
data.content: @mattysino @YouTube Sir, you are too kind. Everyone should check out @SuperteamDAO. They're doing some really dope stuff

data.name: Solana
data.content: 6/ Once you’ve got the basics down, Questbook and @SuperTeamDAO have a great list of tutorials to improve your Solana development skills. https://t.co/UlKgWiXXqk

data.name: Lily Liu
data.content: Amazing community, incredible energy, excellent event. Thanks @SuperteamDAO and @SolanaFndn !  Enjoyed days of bakchod banter with @akshaybd and @thetanmay https://t.co/CRVBqDiByz

data.name: Solana Developers
data.content: .@SuperteamDAO has facilitated the growth of @solana communities around the globe starting in India over a year ago. They've created a product (https://t.co/epusyf8ABE) that allows anyone to earn their first salary in crypto. The GDP of Superteam has now reached $1 million! https://t.co/GNedWKSGfz

data.name: Solana Breakpoint ☀️ AMSTERDAM Oct. 30-Nov.3
data.content:
“I’m building this school to bring fellow Sierra Leoneans opportunity” - @c_ogoo 

The average Sierra Leonean earns $40-60/month. A senior SWE earns ~$300/month.

A single @SuperteamDAO bounty could 3-5x someone’s monthly earnings.

data.name: Solana Breakpoint ☀️ AMSTERDAM Oct. 30-Nov.3
data.content:
“It’s amazing how many people are pushing forward that we never even knew about, and a lot of it’s international. @SuperteamDAO put @solana on the map in India. There’s a one man army running 20 hackathons in Mexico.

It’s a global movement.” - @rajgokal https://t.co/iofq5okmMl

data.name: Mad Armani 🎒
data.content: @akshaybd Superteam is leading the way 🫡

data.name: Based Charker
data.content: While he wrote the playbook, the rest of the team pitches in and supports them to drive the numbers you see today. Fun fact, outside of the US, the top number of submissions came from countries that have been activated with a @SuperteamDAO!

data.name: thelawrenceyan☉🌊💹
data.content:
yo wtf

@SuperteamDAO rn https://t.co/wFvi8BB32I

data.name: Aditya Mallik
data.content:
As a student I had worked as an intern, did some small local gigs for basically no money! 
But through @SuperteamDAO it changed it all!
Now I am working with some top @solana projects, earning real money while still being a student and sitting in my home!
#gdpgdpgdp https://t.co/lt6uqnMfqf

data.name: Paarug Sethi
data.content:
Got my first gig in web3 via superteam’s job board when it was just a podcast.

I was there when the discord formed & community GDP became a thing.

Every opportunity I’ve gotten ever since has been directly/indirectly been related to this group. Forever grateful.❤️

#GDPGDPGDP https://t.co/jzoVCyv4ft

data.name: Paarug Sethi
data.content: 4 countries out of the top 5 have a superteam. coincidence?👀 https://t.co/VE4kPdzcZg

data.name: shek
data.content: 💯 this. If it weren’t for @akshaybd and @SuperteamDAO I wouldn’t have founded @wordcel_club as a company. https://t.co/7ryBI3Aykw

data.name: Yash Agarwal
data.content:
🚨 Update: Going full-time in Web3🚀

From deploying 1st ETH smart contract in 2018 to observing from the sidelines for 3 years. Getting into @SuperteamDAO in 2021, not just revived my Web3 journey, but pushed me to build my own Web3 project!

Thread on my Web3 journey🧵👇

data.name: Het Dagli🔥💃
data.content:
Started my @SuperteamDAO journey by winning a writing bounty exactly a year ago.

Made amazing friends, learned so much, and finally took the leap of faith, left my Web2 job to work for guys I got introduced through @SuperteamDAO 

Grateful for this amazing community.#gdpgdpgdp

data.name: Kunal Bagaria
data.content:
From joining a Discord invite link shared by @thetanmay  to speaking at one of the largest crypto conferences. The journey has been absolutely incredible!

@SuperteamDAO #gdpgdpgdp https://t.co/xsg3qKzDY1

data.name: Bolt / Aabis
data.content:
I joined @SuperteamDAO about an year ago and that changed my life dramatically.
From being a random high school kid to earning, building and winning. There were burnouts, there were work intensive times, however the journey was worth it! #GDPGDPGDP

data.name: Ujjwal Gupta
data.content:
With @SuperteamDAO I've been able to ship better products, get access to the best minds and create value for other members.

Continuing the journey I help builder at @SuperteamVN and onboard the best minds to @solana.

data.name: Rakshit⚡️
data.content:
Today exactly a year back, I wrote this thread which got me in @SuperteamDAO as a member ANDD a full time job @0xPolygon.

I never looked back. I was working at TCS when I wrote it, today I get to work with some of the best people on CT. 

INTERNET REMAINS UNDEFEATED :) https://t.co/cQex84gYIf

data.name: CM 👾| Monstrè
data.content: Expressing my gratitude towards the community and team at @SuperteamDAO. A reflection on my experience since joining their community a few weeks ago. https://t.co/yLksEmTCzq

data.name: DeanTheMachine
data.content: Superteam never misses! https://t.co/lMRta2zkXc

data.name: Solscan
data.content:
#Solana Coding Camp Season 2️⃣ is back🚀

data.name: Anh Tran
data.content:
@hackerhouses Vietnam was by far the best web3 events I’ve ever attended in my life. 

Way too many people to thank for making this such an amazing experience.
-@SolanaFndn for believing in VN 
-All the event organizers and @SuperteamVN  for making everything run so smooth https://t.co/WdvrXVf3e7

data.name: Diksha Dutta
data.content:
Moderated my first event of 2023 for @SuperteamDE   with so much women power on stage 🔥

Lovely meeting you all IRL and getting to know your Web3 journeys: @Dr_Revel_NFT @ZoeCatherineF  @thealbrechteli @cyberkwin  ❤️

and ofc thanks to the queen @tamarincrypto 👑 https://t.co/s1KrGFcwIo

data.name: gulcan yayla
data.content:
The world is full of opportunities no matter where you are, and @SuperteamTR is bringing these to Turkey. Super proud today ❤️
We are waiting for anyone who want to build projects on Solana. Pls reach out and let’s put Turkey to the top of the talent charts!
Let’s go! ❤️‍🔥 https://t.co/DDXGQcJhCV

data.name: Lunapark Web3 Hub 🎡
data.content:
.@SuperteamTR ve @patika_dev Türkiye web3 ekosistemini geliştirmek için @lunaparkhub'ta etkinliklere devam ediyor!

Solana Global Hackathon’da en çok proje sunan ilk 5 ülkeden biri olmak için hep beraber kolları sıvadık! 🥳

ortaya güzel dostluklar, takımlar ve projeler çıktı!💙 https://t.co/6tB25L22jL

data.name: Superteam Germany
data.content:
That's a wrap! Berlin Build Station has come to an end.

With more than 800 attendees, 60 Grizzlython projects, and 2000 bottles of beer, it's a huge W for the German @Solana ecosystem🇩🇪

Let's see what happened👇 https://t.co/wIsSxZTVxQ

data.name: Balaji
data.content:
A new hackathon on DAOs and network states.
$100k in prizes, open globally.
Hosted by Superteam, organized by Solana Foundation.
I’ll be judging the winners. https://t.co/DMstV6HbTp
